        public boolean getImageDownloadSuccessful()
        Description copied from interface: IInAppMessage
        Returns the status of the image download on this in-app message. If the image specified by IInAppMessage.getImageUrl() could not be downloaded successfully then this should return false. Returns false by default.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if the image was downloaded successfully

      • logImpression

        Description copied from interface: IInAppMessage
